text:
SEPTEMBER 18, 1875.]
THE TIMBER TRADES JOURNAL.
THE TYNE.
Sept. 4. Catherine @ Riga,—2,884 deals, Order. Hereasund, —9,758 deals, battens, and boards, 30 pcs. Lucca @ Miramichi,—9,986 deals and ends, Order. Luther @ Gefle,—7,195 battens and deals, Order. Najaden @ Drammen,— 3,070 pit props, Hall Bros. @ Ljusne,—8,708 deals and battens, A. Herd & Co. Mathilda @ Nyvik,—4,787 staves and boards, 1 fm. firewood, J. Black & Co. Svende Forn @ Christiansand,—68,000 staves, 899 poles, 945 props, 62 s[?] 197 pcs. mining timber, 8,038 pit props, Order ; 148,000 Joanchas @ Oscarshamn,—8,038 pit props, Order ; 148,000 headings, J. Black & Co.
Sept. 6. Washington @ Skien,—74,248 ft. battens, S. pt. 6. Danzig,—20 boards, 1 fm. firewood, Capt. Buchan @ Danzig,—20 boards, 1 fm. firewood, [?]
Sept. 7. Diana @ Laurvig,—[?],046 pit props, Order. Sylphiden @ Laurvig,—10,464 pit props, Order. Fair Maid @ Gothenburg,—14,303 pit props, Order. Maria Henricka @ Gothenburg,—42 standards, Order. Brodrens Hoab @ Gothenburg, 5,000 pit props, Pyman, Bell, & Co. Hugin (s) @ Gothenburg— 13,510 pit props, 960 battens, Order. [?] @ Gothenburg—47,358 staves, and laths, Borrie, Craig, & Co. ; pit [?] y. deals, boards, and laths, Borrie, Craig, & Co. ; pit [?] O[?]beck.
Sept. 8. Quebec Packet @ Gothenburg,—9,0[?] standards, 64 ft. staves, Hardy Bros.
Sept. 9. Carl Oscar @ Gothenburg,—20,353 pit props. Janet Jazat @ Gefle,—6,736 deals and battens, A Hoo[?]. Jones @ Gothenburg,—9,713 pit props, Order. San [?] stadt,—7,464 pcs. lathwood, Johnson. 17 di Mai @ 6,949 deals and battens, Hardy Bros.
Sept. 11. Active @ Christiansand,—staves, W. [?]. Ornan @ Memel,—13,210 headings, 58,350 staves, Or[der]. and Arendal Packet @ Arendal,—1,180 pit props, timber, Hall Bros. Da Cape @ Memel, 4,559 deals a[nd] deals and battens, 251 pcs. lathwood, Order. Aphrod[ite] —1,310 pcs. mining timber, 2,151 pit props, Order. burg, 5,481 pit props, Order.
Sept. 13. Eugene @ Gothenburg,—26,139 pit props. Bell, & Co. Clara @ Memel,—3,262 deals and ends, oak wainscot logs, 400 pipe staves, Order.
Sept. 14. Anna Gertrude @ Memel,—2,314 ends. beth Klosterboar @ Graget,—148,000 pcs. firewood, Carl Victor @ Slite,—270,171 staves, J. Black & Co. wall,—12,054 deals, battens, and boards, Order.
Sept. 15. Mary @ Nyvik,—1,743 deals, 7,731 [?] Cowslip @ Cronstadt, 7,328 deals and ends, Pickford & [Co].
BRISTOL.
Sept. 2. Helene @ Ljusne,—17,158 deals, &c., Emblin & Co. Urania @ Archangel,—5,139 deals, Laurenze @ Archangel,—5,461 deals, &c., Jones & Archangel,—4,604 deals, &c., Emblin & Co.
Sept. 6. E. L. Oulton @ Pensacola,—327 pcs. timber. T. Burnes. Eblana @ St. John, N.B.,—20,989 deals. Northern Star @ Sackville, N.B.,—11,42[?] ends, 11,350 palings, Order.
Sept. 9. Calypso (s) @ Bordeaux,—qnty. pit props. Houghton @ Bath Maine,—5,684 deals, 678 deal ends.
Sept. 13. Guildfax @ Chatham, N.B.,—18,743 deals. & Co. Equator @ Onega,—11,049 deals, &c., T. Bar[nes]. stadt,—10,905 deals, &c., Taylor & Co. Rosina @ [?] deals, 1,086 ends, 5,709 pcs. lathwood, Jones & Co.
WEST HARTLEPOOL.
Sept. 4. Activ @ Pitea,—5,620 deals, &c., J. R[hodes]. @ Pitea,—10,607 battens and boards, J. Rhodes & Memel,—17,940 staves, Order. Fylla @ Archangel,— ends, Harston & Sheraton. Trientze Gesina @ Riga,— ends, R. Wade, Sons, & Co. Amalina @ Christiana,— battens, Order. Orion @ Rugenwalde,—644 sq. sleepers, 83 1/2-sq. sleepers, R. Wade, Sons, & Co. Danzig,—1,286 pcs. sq. fir timber, 391 sq. fir sleepers. wood, R. Wade, Sons, & Co.
Sept. 6. Rathwaite Hall (s) @ Riga,—6,478 [?] sleepers, Order. Charles Lambert @ Gefl[e]. J. Rhodes & Co. Olaf @ Sprangsviken,—4,331 [?] 11,948 boards, R. Wade, Sons, & Co. Congal @ deals, &c., Wm. Brown, of Luton. Deutschland @ pcs. sq. fir timber, 235 sq. fir sleepers, 277 1/2-sleepers. & Co. Ewig Reit @ Memel,—9,790 boards, Order. —8,646 battens, J. Rhodes & Co. Caroline Smith. 12,652 deals, &c., J. Rhodes & Co. Anna Maria [?] deals and boards, R. Wade, Sons, & Co. Hanna[h]. 10,048 deals and battens, J. Rhodes & Co.
Sept. 7. Consul Parry @ Soderhamn,—14,386 fir deals. Son, & Co. ; Fanny @ Uleaborg,—12,162 deals and battens. cock ; Emanuel @ Fredrikstad,— 6,037 battens, [Order]. Kotka,—5,754 deals and boards, J. Rhodes & Co. ; A[?] —3,737 battens, J. Walker & Co. ; Sovereign @ Soderhamn,—13,169

deals, Harrison & Singleton. Malvina @ Gefle,—5,054 battens, J. Walker & Co. ; Constance (s) @ Riga,—8,759 800 1/2-sleepers, qty. of lathwood, R. Wade, Son*, & Co.
Sept. 8. Peter @ Burea,—15,681 deals, &c., R. [?] & Co.
Sept. 9. Maria @ Riga,—6,900 fir deals and ends. & Singleton ; Jenny @ Hudikswall,—17,717 boards, Order. @ Pitea,—4,795 deals and battens, Harston & Sheraton. Skutham,—10,735 deals and boards, J. Rhodes & Co.
Sept. 10. Fulmar (s) @ Windau,—5,740 square 1/2-sleepers, Order. Etna (s) @ Riga,—qty. of lathwood, 10,078 square sleepers, 858 1/2-square sleepers, Order.
Sept. 11. Ocean Mail @ Helsingfors,—12,304 deals. Order. Catherine Roberts @ Skutskar,—12,363 deals. W. Dawbarn & Co. ; Laura @ Memel,—31,468 oak staves. Co. ; Gitana (s) @ Gothenburg,—8,491 bdls. laths, 5,0[?]
Sept. 13. Alabama (s) @ Riga,—13,883 square 1/2-sleepers, qty. lathwood, Order. Ermina @ Tuna[?] & Sheraton.
wood boards, Harston & Sheraton.
Sept. 14. Storfursten @ Uleaborg,—18,865 deals. Augusta @ Pitea,—3,823 battens, Harston & Sheraton. leman @ Riga,—5,039 deals and ends, W. Dawbarn [?] Archangel,—4,623 pcs. deals and ends, Harrison & [Co]. (s) @ Wyburg,—31,246 deals, &c., J. Rhodes & Co. Skien,—1,654 pcs. mining timber, quantity of battens. & Co. Thor @ Fredrikshamn,—9,229 deals and ends. Sons, & Co.
Sept. 15. Thor @ Forsly Ham,—5,700 pcs. battens. Co. Emma @ Dantzic,—2,353 fir sleepers, 382 1/2-sleepers. Sons, & Co. Venus @ Soderhamn,—13,315 deals and & Co.
GRANGEMOUTH.
Aug. 30. Framnæs @ Drammen,—7,008 battens.
Sept. 1. Laura @ Richibucto,—1,2649 deals, [?] 1,771 palings, A. Thomson & Nephews.
Sept. 3. Mercury @ Gothenburg,—3,533 deals. Alpheim @ Drammen,—7,680 battens, J. T. Salvesen.
Sept. 4. Ida @ Gothenburg,—6,135 deals, [Order]. Hermoder @ Christiania,—3,884 battens, J. T. Salvesen. Wold Huitfeldt @ Memel,—4,116 deals, J. T. Salvesen.
Sept. 6. Mary @ Archangel,—3,221 deals and son & Nephews. George and Adolph @ Bjorneborg. battens, A Thomson & Nephews.
Sept. 7. Tobine @ Sandefjord,—3,472 battens. Gem @ Drammen,—5,132 battens, J. T. Salvesen. carshamn,—69 cut fathoms, 7ft. lathwood, M[?] Pollux @ Archangel,—5,451 deals and battens, [Order]. Eleonore Von Florow @ Athens,—5,536 deals and Primula @ Fredrikstadt,—500,430 staves, A. [?]
Sept. 8. Speculation @ Riga,—3,778 deals and & Co. Louise Auguste @ Cronstadt,—4,611 deals. battens, Order. Enigheden @ Yockno,—10,93[?]
Sept. 9. Doctor Von Graefe @ Riga,—[?] pherson & McLaren. Josephina @ Archangel,—[?] A. Thomson & Nephews.
Sept. 10. Thetis @ Christiania,—11,76[?] Co. Elizabeth @ Pataholm,—40 fthms. lathwood. Laren.
Sept. 11. Marie @ Christiania,—12,89[?] Co. Hunter @ Czonstadt,—7,759 deals and ends. MacPherson & McLaren.
LEITH.
Sept. 2. Stirling @ Cronstadt,—14[?] Louise @ Archangel,—5,947 battens, Mitchell.
Sept. 3. Helene @ Holmstrand,—3,[?] Co. Kvik @ Narva,—7,940 battens, Ferguson.
Sept. 4. Ludwig @ Ljusne,—3,257 [?] Order. Licence @ Narva,—4,568 deals and son, & Co.
Sept. 8. De Ni Sodskende @ Dram,—[?] & Co. Agil @ Dram,—7,589 battens, Order.
Sept. 9. Johanne @ Christiansand,—[?] Foreninger @ Kopmansholman,—10,614 [?] & Co.
Sept. 10. Eliezer @ Christiansand,—[?] Sept. 11. Boris @ Libau,—100 sleepers. ham,—53 1/2 fms. lathwood, Sellentin & [Co].
Sept. 13. Pauline @ Asbacker,—[?] Order.
Sept. 14. Haabet @ Pillan,—14,62[?]
GRANTON.
Sept. 3. Union @ Riga,—1,340 sleepers. Margaretha @ Riga,—[?]
Sept. 6. Alert @ Krageroe,—9,03[?] Albatross @ Sandefiord,—5,537 props, Order.
Sept. 8. Franz @ Sundswall,—[?] Mitchell, Thomson, & Co. Rugia @ Ulleaborg. Thomson, & Co.
Sept. 9. Roelf Heres @ Riga,—2,323 sleepers, Calder & Co.

171
deals, Harrison & Singleton. Malvina @ Gefle,—5,054 deals, Harrison & Singleton. Rosa @ Drammen,—10,284 deals, Harrison & Singleton. Matthew F. Mauny @ Gefle,—[?] deals and ends, R. Wade, Sons, boards,—R. Wade, Sons.
